name: Beat Squares
description:
Beat Squares is game based on the popular VR-game BEAT SABER. But in 2d and with some changes, like random spawning of "the squares" (but still somewhat on the beat). Switch color and swing your cursor around the screen to destroy the squares on the beat of some great music from Nihilore (not made during the jam)!

Made for Mix and Game Jam 2019 with the theme Dimension Change. Using Unity and C#.

CONTROLS:

Mouse to move your dot around, and left click to activate RED and right click to active BLUE.

ESCAPE to go back to the menu.

ART:

All art is made by me in Adobe Photoshop.

FONTS: 

Neon tubes (titel/logo) https://www.graphicux.com/fonts/neon-tubes-neon-light-font-free/.

Teko (General text) https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Teko.

AUDIO:
Sound effects from Freesound.org and Footagecrate.com and slighty edited in Adobe Audition.

https://freesound.org/people/lebaston100/sounds/264438/

https://freesound.org/people/Raclure/sounds/483598/

MUSIC:

Music from Nihilore and edited shorter in Unity.

http://www.nihilore.com/license

Feel free to comment your score and/or some feedback!
